Job Title: Finance Manager

Location: Nashville, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Our client is a mid-sized, successful, family-owned CPG company. They are seeking a multifaceted Finance Manager to join their finance team. As the Finance Manager, you will play a pivotal role in our finance team, contributing your expertise to our financial strategy, decision-making, and the overall fiscal health of the organization. You'll be responsible for not only analyzing financial data but also translating those numbers into compelling stories that guide our strategic decisions. With your strong background in accounting and finance, you'll help steer the organization towards continued success through the art of financial storytelling.
This position is fully onsite in Nashville, IL.
